      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:A210_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>A210_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Approaching plays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nähernde Spiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux d'approche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos aproximando-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi d'avvicinamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλησιάζοντας παιχνίδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos que se acercan</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Do you want to get more out of drama? This unit is designed to develop the analytical skills you need for a more in-depth study of literary plays. You will learn about dialogue, stage directions, blank verse, dramatic structure and conventions and aspects of performance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Blank_verse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Dialogue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Dramatic_structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Literary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Performance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Plays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Stage_directions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Möchten Sie mehr aus Drama heraus erhalten? 
Diese Maßeinheit ist konzipiert, um die analytischen 
Fähigkeiten zu entwickeln, die Sie für eine eingehendere Studie der 
literarischen Spiele benötigen. Sie erlernen über Dialog, 
Stadium Richtungen, unbelegter Vers, drastische Struktur und
Vereinbarungen und Aspekte der Leistung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voulez-vous obtenir plus hors du drame ? 
Cette unité est conçue pour développer les qualifications 
analytiques que vous avez besoin pour une étude plus appronfondie des
jeux littéraires. Vous vous renseignerez sur le dialogue, les 
directions d'étape, le vers blanc, la structure et les conventions 
excessives et les aspects de l'exécution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você quer começar mais fora do drama? 
Esta unidade é projetada desenvolver as habilidades que 
analíticas você necessita para um estudo mais in-depth de jogos 
literários. Você aprenderá sobre o diálogo, os sentidos do 
estágio, verso em branco, estrutura e convenções dramáticas e 
aspectos do desempenho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Desiderate ottenere più dal dramma? Questa
unità è destinata per sviluppare le abilità che analitiche avete 
bisogno di per uno studio più approfondito sui giochi letterari. 
Imparerete circa il dialogo, sensi della fase, verse in bianco, 
struttura e convenzioni drammatiche e funzioni delle prestazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέλετε να πάρετε περισσότερων από το δράμα; 
Αυτή η μονάδα σχεδιάζεται για να αναπτύξει τις αναλυτικές 
δεξιότητες που χρειάζεστε για μια πιό σε βάθος μελέτη των 
λογοτεχνικών παιχνιδιών. Θα μάθετε για το διαλογικό 
παράθυρο, τις σκηνικές κατευθύνσεις, τον κενό στίχο, τη 
δραματικές δομή και τις συμβάσεις και τις πτυχές της απόδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted desea conseguir más de drama? Esta 
unidad se diseña para desarrollar las habilidades analíticas que 
usted necesita para un estudio más profundizado de juegos literarios.
Usted aprenderá sobre diálogo, las direcciones de la etapa, 
verso en blanco, estructura y las convenciones dramáticas y los 
aspectos del funcionamiento.</string>
          </description>
